borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: The outbuilding hereby approved shall only be used for purposes incidental to the enjoyment of the dwellinghouse as such. It shall not be used for purposes conflicting with the use of the property as a single dwellinghouse, and in particular it shall not be used as a separate unit of accommodation.

<p>The development hereby approved shall only be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:</p><p>Location Plan and Block Plan - AA11SD01 R02 - 15/08/2023</p><p>Proposed Floor Plan - AA11SD07 R02 - 15/08/2023</p><p>Proposed Loft and Roof Plan - AA11SD08 R02 - 15/08/2023</p><p>Proposed Elevation - AA11SD09 R02 - 15/08/2023</p><p>Proposed Elevation - AA11SD10 R02 - 15/08/2023</p><p>Proposed Section - AA11SD11 R02 - 15/08/2023</p><p>Proposed Outbuilding Floor Plan - AA11SD15 - 12/06/2023</p><p>Proposed Outbuilding Elevation - AA11SD16 - 12/06/2023</p><p>No other drawings or documents apply.</p>
The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing dwellinghouse.
The development hereby permitted shall be commenced before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
description: Construction of a single storey part rear/side extension and first floor part rear and side extension, front porch and Hip-to-gable roof extension to accommodate a rear	Dormer extension including	two roof lights to the front to facilitate conversion of roof space into habitable accommodation.  Demolition of existing two outbuildings and construction of a single outbuilding.
